name: Fuseshot Alpha
description:
"Every day in my home town was my greatest of efforts getting bad guys taken down and getting the money... but I realized that wasn't all I wanted to do... I suddenly had the urge to do the right thing and move to a new town as the new sheriff.... though one year into it our dear Mayor Jex is kidnapped... and it is up to me to save him.."

Includes:

- Up to 10 quests so far to do for citizens around the town!

We try to update every few weeks

(Other game in trailer: https://focusbit.itch.io/charstmas)
